SEARCH
Package io.github.jnodorp.jiffybox.builders

Schnittstelle MonitoringCheckBuilder

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
DefaultMonitoringCheckBuilder
public interface MonitoringCheckBuilder
This class is used to build monitoring checks. Use any of the methods you need and get the built object using the 'build' method.

  • Methodendetails

    • withContactgroups

      MonitoringCheckBuilder withContactgroups(List<Integer> contactgroups)
      Set the contact groups.
      Parameter:
      contactgroups - One or more contact group IDs to which e-mail notifications should be sent. If this parameter is missing the results can be checked only within the control panel.
      Gibt zurück:
      The same builder for method chaining.

    • withCheckInterval

      MonitoringCheckBuilder withCheckInterval(int checkInterval)
      Set the check interval.
      Parameter:
      checkInterval - The check interval specifies in which period the check is executed. Default: 5 minutes (300 Seconds).
      Gibt zurück:
      The same builder for method chaining.

    • withReminderInterval

      MonitoringCheckBuilder withReminderInterval(int reminderInterval)
      Set the reminder interval.
      Parameter:
      reminderInterval - The reminder interval specifies in which period e-mails are sent. Default: 1 Hour (3600 Seconds).
      Gibt zurück:
      The same builder for method chaining.

    • withRetryTolerance

      MonitoringCheckBuilder withRetryTolerance(int retryTolerance)
      Set the retry tolerance.
      Parameter:
      retryTolerance - The retry tolerance specifies how often a monitoring check has to become critical before a notification is sent. Default: 3.
      Gibt zurück:
      The same builder for method chaining.

    • withTimeout

      MonitoringCheckBuilder withTimeout(int timeout)
      Set the timeout.
      Parameter:
      timeout - The timeout value specifies after which time the check is aborted. Default: 30.
      Gibt zurück:
      The same builder for method chaining.

    • withActive

      MonitoringCheckBuilder withActive(boolean active)
      Set active.
      Parameter:
      active - Monitoring checks can be created as well active (asynchronous process), and checked after a reload of the monitoring configuration, as inactive and saved only.
      Gibt zurück:
      The same builder for method chaining.
